passive.lne_archers.ender_dragon_ranged_: Deals 10% magic damage according to the shooters Ranged Damage.
Deals 25% magic damage according to the shooters Ranged Damage.
spell.lne_archers.passive_dragon_bow.des: When the Ender Dragon roars, you have a small time frame to release a Dragon Bolt.
passive.lne_archers.elder_guardian_range: The sharp corals cause bleeding on hit.
passive.lne_archers.wither_ranged_1: Inflicts the Wither Effect on the hit target.
passive.lne_archers.wither_ranged_2: With each harmful status effect on the target, the arrow deals more damage according to the shooters Ranged Damage.
passive.lne_archers.glacial_ranged_1: Adds the Freezing Status effect every hit.
passive.lne_archers.glacial_ranged_2: Stacks Freezing Ticks on the hit entity.
